headline: Iron Mountain Incorporated Upsizes and Prices Debt Offering
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., December 03, 2024--Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM) (the "Company"), a global leader in information management services, today announced that it has priced an upsized offering by way of a private placement of $1.2 billion aggregate principal amount of its 6.25% Senior Notes due 2033 (the "Notes"). This represents an increase of $450.0 million in the combined aggregate principal amount of the Notes, from the previously announced amount of $750.0 million. The Notes will be

headline: Iron Mountain Incorporated Announces Debt Offering
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., December 03, 2024--Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM) (the "Company"), a global leader in information management services, today announced a proposed offering by way of a private placement of a total of $750.0 million aggregate principal amount of its Senior Notes due 2033 (the "Notes"). The Notes will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by the Company’s subsidiaries that are obligors under each series of its existing notes. The Company intends to use the net proceeds f

headline: USRT: Large Cap U.S. REITs Likely To Trail Small Peers In 2025
summary: iShares Core U.S. REIT ETF tracks 134 US REITs, while Wall Street estimates suggest USRT's top 10 holdings offer a modest upside in 2025. Click for more on USRT.
